chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
b: R
a: R

Goal:
sign (b - a) * (Rmax a b - Rmin a b) = b - a

Premises:
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
sign = fun x : R => match total_order_T 0 x with | inleft (left _) => 1 | inleft (right _) => 0 | inright _ => -1 end : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
MVT_abs : forall (f f' : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall c : R, Rmin a b <= c <= Rmax a b -> derivable_pt_lim f c (f' c)) -> exists c : R, Rabs (f b - f a) = Rabs (f' c) * Rabs (b - a) /\ Rmin a b <= c <= Rmax a b
Rsqr_minus_plus : forall a b : R, (a - b) * (a + b) = a² - b²
MVT_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : derivable f), a < b -> exists c : R, f b - f a = derive_pt f c (pr c) * (b - a) /\ a < c < b
MVT_cor2 : forall (f f' : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall c : R, a <= c <= b -> derivable_pt_lim f c (f' c)) -> exists c : R, f b - f a = f' c * (b - a) /\ a < c < b
MVT : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr1 : forall c : R, a < c < b -> derivable_pt f c) (pr2 : forall c : R, a < c < b -> derivable_pt g c), a < b -> (forall c : R, a <= c <= b -> continuity_pt f c) -> (forall c : R, a <= c <= b -> continuity_pt g c) -> exists (c : R) (P : a < c < b), (g b - g a) * derive_pt f c (pr1 c P) = (f b - f a) * derive_pt g c (pr2 c P)
Rabs_triang : forall a b : R, Rabs (a + b) <= Rabs a + Rabs b
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Rmin_Rmax_r : forall a b : R, Rmin a b <= b <= Rmax a b
Rmin_Rmax_l : forall a b : R, Rmin a b <= a <= Rmax a b
Rmin_Rmax : forall a b : R, Rmin a b <= Rmax a b
Rminmax : forall a b : R, Rmin a b <= Rmax a b
Riemann_integrable_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable g a b
RiemannInt_P11 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (phi1 phi2 psi1 psi2 : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi1 n t) <= psi1 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi1 n)) < un n) -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi2 n t) <= psi2 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi2 n)) < un n) -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi1 N)) l -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi2 N)) l
RiemannInt_P2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> a <= b -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
StepFun_P39 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), RiemannInt_SF f = - RiemannInt_SF {| fe := f; pre := StepFun_P6 (pre f) |}
RiemannInt_P3 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
fe : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R -> R
sign_opp : forall x : R, sign (- x) = - sign x
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> l1 <> 0 -> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
StepFun_P6 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), IsStepFun f a b -> IsStepFun f b a
maj_term4 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 alp_f2c : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2c -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * f2 x * eps / (8 * f1 x * l2))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2c -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> f1 x <> 0 ->...-> Rabs (l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)) < eps / 4
StepFun_P28 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b
open_interval = fun a b x : R => a < x < b : R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope R_scope]
Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse : forall r1 r2 : R, - r1 * r2 = - (r1 * r2)
Ropp_mult_distr_r_reverse : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * - r2 = - (r1 * r2)
subdivision : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
subdivision_val : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
StepFun_P2 : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (l lf : Rlist), adapted_couple f a b l lf -> adapted_couple f b a l lf
StepFun_P32 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => Rabs (f x)) a b
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2d ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
pre : forall (a b : R) (s : StepFun a b), IsStepFun s a b
StepFun_P17 : forall (f : R -> R) (l1 l2 lf1 lf2 : Rlist) (a b : R), adapted_couple f a b l1 lf1 -> adapted_couple f a b l2 lf2 -> Int_SF lf1 l1 = Int_SF lf2 l2
Ropp_minus_distr : forall r1 r2 : R, - (r1 - r2) = r2 - r1
StepFun_P1 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), adapted_couple f a b (subdivision f) (subdivision_val f)
Ropp_plus_distr : forall r1 r2 : R, - (r1 + r2) = - r1 + - r2
StepFun_P37 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
Ropp_involutive : forall r : R, - - r = r

```coq
unfold sign, Rmax, Rmin.
repeat destruct (total_order_T 0 (b - a)).
- simpl. rewrite Rmax_left, Rmin_right; lra.
- simpl. rewrite Rmax_left, Rmin_left; lra.
- simpl. rewrite Rmax_right, Rmin_right; lra.
Qed.
```

original: unfold sign, Rmax, Rmin. repeat destruct (total_order_T 0 (b - a)). - simpl.
